response.body: {"id": "13ce4f95fce6e6f0220c803c24cd2dfd","text": "The "save"," icon on Microsoft Word shows a floppy disk with the shutter on backwards.", "source": "djtech.net", "source_url": "http://www.djtech.net/humor/useless_facts.htm", "language": "en", "permalink": "https://uselessfacts.jsph.pl/api/v2/facts/13ce4f95fce6e6f0220c803c24cd2dfd"}
